document.docAuthor: Bernhard A. Huber & Charles M. Warui
document.docName: Huber, B. A., _ Warui, C. M. (2012). East African pholcid spiders an overview, with descriptions of eight new species (Araneae, Pholcidae) . .pdf (Done).imf
document.masterDocTitle: East African pholcid spiders: an overview, with descriptions of eight new species (Araneae, Pholcidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: East African pholcid spiders: an overview, with descriptions of eight new species (Araneae, Pholcidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
1 ♂ , 1 ♀ syntypes and 2 juvs. from Kenya , Mount Kenya , “ st. no 39” [ 0°10.5’S , 37°08.9’E ],
Jan.-Feb. 1912
( Alluaud, Jeannel ), in MNHN ( AR 10368 ), examined (not available in Huber 2003a )
.

KENYA :
Eastern Province
: 1 ♂ , 1 ♀ (medium morph), in ZFMK ( Ar 8685 ),
Mt. Kenya N.P., Chogoria Forest, “site 1”
( 0°12.1’S , 37°29.4’E ),
2460 m
a.s.l.,
27 Jan. 2010
( B.A. Huber )
;
5 ♂♂ , 6 ♀♀ (light morph) in ZFMK ( Ar 8686 ), same data
;
1 ♂ , 3 ♀♀ , 1 juv. (light morph) in pure ethanol, in ZFMK ( Ken 111 ), same data
;
9 ♂♂ , 8 ♀♀ (dark morph), in ZFMK ( Ar 8687 ),
Chogoria Forest, “site 2”
( 0°14.2’S , 37°34.0’E ),
1950 m
a.s.l.,
27 Jan. 2010
( B.A. Huber )
;
1 ♂ , 3 ♀ in pure ethanol, in ZFMK ( Ken 120 ), same data
;
~ 20 ♂♂ , 20 ♀♀ (2 vials), in ZFMK ( Ar 8688-89 ), Mt. Kenya ,
Chogoria Route
[ 0°14.1’S , 37°33.1’E ],
2000 m
a.s.l.,
21 Oct. 2002
( T. Wagner ), fogging of
Podocarpus latifolius
;
~ 60 ♂♂ , 60 ♀♀ (3 vials), in ZFMK ( Ar 8690-92 ), same data but
2500 m
a.s.l. [ 0°11.8’S , 37°29.1’E ],
19 Oct. 2002
;
~ 80 ♂♂ , 80 ♀♀ (3 vials), in ZFMK ( Ar 8693-95 ), same data but
3000 m
a.s.l. [ 0°09.1’S , 37°26.1’E ],
16 Oct. 2002
;
4 ♂♂ , 10 ♀♀ (medium morph), in MRAC ( 215189, 193, 198, 251 ),
Chogoria Forest
, bamboo forest at
2660 m
a.s.l. [ 0°11.0’S , 37°27.9’E ],
24 Apr. 2004
( R. Jocqué, C. Warui, van den Spiegel )
;
1 ♀ , in MRAC ( 161912 ), Sirimon track at
2650 m
a.s.l. [ 0°00.2’S , 37°15.6’E ],
23 Jul. 1975
( R. Bosmans )
.
Central Province
: 13 ♂♂ , 23 ♀♀ (dark morph), in ZFMK ( Ar 8696-97 ), Mt. Kenya N.P., Naro Moru Forest , overhangs along road (0°10.2’-10.6’S, 37°12.0’-13.3’E),
2800-3200 m
a.s.l.,
29 Jan. 2010
( B.A. Huber )
;
2 ♂♂ , 4 ♀♀ in pure ethanol, in ZFMK ( Ken 124 ), same data
;
1 ♂ , 2 ♀♀ (medium morph), in ZFMK ( Ar 8698 ), same data
;
2 ♀♀ , 1 juv. (medium morph) in pure ethanol, in ZFMK ( Ken 125 ), same data
;
11 ♂♂ , 10 ♀♀ (dark morph), in ZFMK ( Ar 8699 ), Mt. Kenya N.P., above Naro Moru Forest , small cave ( 0°10.0’S , 37°14.0’E ),
3580 m
a.s.l.,
29 Jan. 2010
( B.A. Huber )
;
1 ♂ , 3 ♀♀ , 2 juvs. in pure ethanol, in ZFMK ( Ken 127 ), same data
;
1 ♂ , 5 ♀♀ (4 vials; dark and medium morphs), in ZFMK ( Ar 8700-03 ), Mt. Kenya N.P. (West ) ( 0°10’S , 37°09’E ),
2550 m
a.s.l., fogging of
Podocarpus latifolius
,
Feb.1999
( T. Wagner )
;
3 ♀♀ (2 vials, medium and dark morphs), in ZFMK ( Ar 8704-05 ), same data but fogging of
Afrocrania volckensii
;
5 ♂♂ , 9 ♀♀ , 3 juvs. (light morph) and 1 ♀ (dark morph), in MRAC ( 215075, 125, 132, 133, 393 ),
Castle Forest, 1.5 km S of lodge
[ 0°23.5’S , 37°18.6’E ],
1985 m
a.s.l.,
21 Apr. 2004
( R. Jocqué, C. Warui, van den Spiegel )
;
1 ♀ (light morph), in MRAC ( 215141 ), same data but clearing of forest near lodge [ 0°22.9’S , 37°18.7’E ],
2025 m
a.s.l
.;
5 ♂♂ , 23 ♀♀ (medium morph), in MRAC ( 215161 ), same data but bamboo forest at
2445 m
a.s.l. [ 0°19.9’S , 37°19.0’E ]
;
33 ♂♂ , 77 ♀♀ (10 vials; mostly medium morph, few dark morph), in ZFMK ( Ar 8706-15 ), Aberdare National Park at
2750 m
a.s.l. ( 0°23’S , 36°46’E ), fogging of
Podocarpus latifolius
,
Jan.-Feb.1999
( T. Wagner )
;
9 ♂♂ , 23 ♀♀ (5 vials; light, medium, and dark morphs), in ZFMK ( Ar 8716-17, 19-21 ), Kikuyu Escarpment, Gatamaiyu ( 0°58’S , 36°42’E ),
2330 m
a.s.l., mountain forest , fogging of
Podocarpus latifolius
,
Feb. 1999
( T. Wagner )
;
6 ♂♂ , 11 ♀♀ (7 vials; light and dark morphs), in ZFMK ( Ar 8722-28 ), same data but fogging of
Tabernaemontana stapfiana
,
18-23 Jan. 1999
;
2 ♂♂ , 10 ♀♀ (4 vials, light, medium, and dark morphs), in ZFMK ( Ar 8729-32 ), same data but fogging of
Teclea nobilis
,
18-23 Jan. 1999
.
Western Province
: 1 ♂ , 3 ♀♀ , 1 juv. (dark morph), in ZFMK ( Ar 8733 ), Kakamega Forest N.P., near Isiukhu River Falls ( 0°21.1’N , 34°52.1’E ),
1580 m
a.s.l.,
2-3 Feb. 2010
( B.A. Huber )
;
1 ♀ , 3 juvs. in pure ethanol, in ZFMK ( Ken 140 ), same data
.
Rift Valley
: 8 ♂♂ , 11 ♀♀ , juvs. (dark morph), in ZFMK ( Ar 8734 ),
Thompson Falls near Nyahururu
, ( 0°02.7’N , 36°22.1’E ),
2350 m
a.s.l.,
30 Jan. 2010
( B.A. Huber )
;
2 ♂♂ , 3 ♀♀ , 10 juvs. in pure ethanol, in ZFMK ( Ken 131 ), same data
;
5 ♂♂ , 4 ♀♀ (dark morph), in ZFMK ( Ar 8735 ),
Mau Escarpment between Kericho and Molo
, forest fragment near road ( 0°14.3’S , 35°32.7’E ),
2130 m
a.s.l.,
4 Feb. 2010
( B.A. Huber )
;
1 ♀ , 5 juvs. in pure ethanol, in ZFMK ( Ken 137 ), same data
;
1 ♀ , in CJFM ( 1543 ), Kitale , Kaibos [ 1°12’N , 35°08’E ?]
